imp.core.graphics

Class TexturedGLModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.graphics.AbstractGLObject
      • imp.core.graphics.GLModel
        • imp.core.graphics.TexturedGLModel

  • public class TexturedGLModel
extends GLModel
    This class is used to draw models that are textured.
    Author:
    kuszewskij

    • Constructor Detail

      • TexturedGLModel

        public TexturedGLModel(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.Float[] vertices,
               Vec3[] parsedFaces,
               java.lang.Float[] normalData,
               Mat4 initialRotation,
               java.lang.Float[] UVCoordinates,
               java.util.List<Vec2> textureMappings,
               java.util.List<com.jogamp.opengl.util.texture.Texture> textures,
               java.util.List<Vec2> materialMappings,
               java.util.List<Material> materials)
        This is the constructor for this class.
        Parameters:
        name - This is the name of the model
        vertices - This is a Float[] containing all of the vertices composing this model
        parsedFaces - This is a Vec3[] containing pairing information defining what vertices define what faces and what UV coordinates are mapped to what vertices. it is in the obj format of v/vt/vn. It must atleast have vertex and texture data.
        normalData - This is a Float[] containing the normals for each face.
        initialRotation - This is a matrix defining how the model is initialy orientated
        UVCoordinates - This is a Float[] containing UV coordinates for each vertex
        textureMapings - This contains information for what faces are drawn using what textures. The x components of the Vec2s define the index of the first face drawn with the texture defined in the y component of the Vec2 in the textures argument. Each face from the x component to the x component of the next Vec2. If there is no next Vec2 then each face from the x component to the end of the list is drawn using the texture defined in the y component.
        textures - This contains all of the textures used to draw the models.
